results.title: An International Multicenter Cohort Study on beta-Blockers for the Treatment of Symptomatic Children With Catecholaminergic Polymorphic Ventricular Tachycardia.
results.text_hl: The primary outcome was the first occurrence of @DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@sudden cardiac death@@@, @DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@sudden cardiac arrest@@@, appropriate implantable cardioverter-defibrillator shock, or @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@. The secondary outcome was the first occurrence of any of the primary outcomes except @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@.

results.title: The Efficacy of Beta-Blockers in Patients With Long QT Syndrome 1-3 According to Individuals' Gender, Age, and QTc Intervals: A Network Meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Clinical evidence from numerous previous studies suggested that beta blockers (BBs), including @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@, exhibit different efficacies for reducing the risk of cardiac events (CEs), such as @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@arrest cardiac arrest@@@ (@DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@ACA@@@), and @DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@SCD@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Post_Acute_COVID_19_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D000094024 @@@LQTS@@@.

citations.NLM: Han L, Liu F, Li Q, Qing T, Zhai Z, Xia Z, Li J. The Efficacy of Beta-Blockers in Patients With Long QT Syndrome 1-3 According to Individuals' Gender, Age, and QTc Intervals: A Network Meta-analysis Front Pharmacol. 2020;11():579525. PMID: 33381033

results.title: Ventricular pre-excitation in cats: 17 cases.
results.text_hl: Clinical signs at presentation included @DISEASE_Lethargy @DISEASE_MESH:D053609 @@@lethargy@@@ (10/17 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@), @DISEASE_Tachypnea @DISEASE_MESH:D059246 @@@tachypnea@@@ (6/17 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@), and/or @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@ (3/17 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@).

results.title: Usefulness of head-up tilt test in the evaluation and management of unexplained syncope or pre-syncope.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the HUT test is mostly well tolerated and safe, even though the test has a low rate of adverse effects. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ is effective for the prevention of provoked or spontaneous recurrent @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@ or pre-@<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@.

results.title: A case of atenolol-induced sinus node dysfunction presenting as escape-capture bigeminy
results.text_hl: We report a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who was taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ presented with recurrent near @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncopal spells@@@ due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-induced @DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@sinus node dysfunction@@@ manifested in the form of an interesting and rare @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ known as Escape-capture bigeminy.

results.title: Potential cardiotoxic reaction involving rivastigmine and beta-blockers: a case report and review of the literature.
results.text_hl: The potentially toxic combination of @CHEMICAL_Rivastigmine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068836 @@@rivastigmine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was then identified as a plausible causative factor of this @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@syncope@@@ and was subsequently discontinued.
